title: Form Applications
description: Used when any application process is started, such as financing, limit changes, or educational programs.

xdm:formApplicationApproved.title: Form Application Approved
xdm:formApplicationApproved.description: Captured when a visitor application has been approved.

xdm:formApplicationDeclined.title: Form Application Declined
xdm:formApplicationDeclined.description: Captured when a visitor application has been declined.

xdm:formApplicationID.title: Form Application ID
xdm:formApplicationID.description: Identifier used during an application process.

xdm:formApplicationRequestedAmount.title: Form Application Requested Amount
xdm:formApplicationRequestedAmount.description: Tracks the monetary value of the application.

xdm:formApplicationStatus.title: Form Application Status
xdm:formApplicationStatus.description: Captures the status of the application for any given point in the application process.

xdm:formApplicationStatusUpdate.title: Form Application Status Update
xdm:formApplicationStatusUpdate.description: Captured when the status for an application changes, either from an online or offline update.

xdm:formApplicationUnderReview.title: Form Application Under Review
xdm:formApplicationUnderReview.description: Captured when a visitor application has been placed under review.
